title: Why Happy People Lose Weight
itunes:title: Why Happy People Lose Weight
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

 

 

Today we talk about the difference between happy people and unhappy people and how being happy or unhappy can affect your weight loss.

 

Happy people have a perspective on the circumstances of their lives that set them up to be positive and forward thinking. Unhappy people are closed up disaster planners who have a hard time setting and reaching goals.

 

Which are you? Listen in and decide. The great news is that you get to choose which you want to be.
